scripts.backfill:genres: node -e "(async()=>{const {db}=await import('./src/config/db.js'); const {booksTable,genresCatalogTable}=await import('./src/db/schema.js'); const {backfillGenresCatalog}=await import('./src/scripts/openLibraryScript.js'); const res=await backfillGenresCatalog(db,{booksTable,genresCatalogTable}); console.log('Inserted genres:',res.inserted);})().catch(e=>{console.error(e); process.exit(1);})"
